body: I think you could just rewrite the story with the same pictures and it'd be fine.  Mafia raping their own family just seems weird, how about if it was the male character with the sketchy family(and he doesn't know), and the gangsters went for his girl as punishment
Art is great, hell I love the fact that it's got a cute Russian girl on this for a change (Спасибо/spasibo!), but the direction that the plot took was... meh.

hell no!!!! fuck NTR

The art was good, but one major selling point of a doujin is the story. And the story flopped. Hard. And what flopped isn't even about why her dad hired thugs to rape her. Her dad probably just hired the cheapest muscle he could afford. And the thugs, knowing no respect, played with her for a bit, which might be the end of them once they hand her over to her dad. Mafias either treat their family like kings & queens, or end them themselves. But what actually flopped, is who the fuck doesn't fact check a family they're marrying? MC's dad must've been an even bigger cuck than him to be charmed by a beautiful woman, and marrying her without even knowing her past. At least then they could've prepared and made sure the little sister won't be ensnared by her dead-beat dad.
Accurate; mafia hates ordinary gangs and will drive scumbags out their communities. They might not be the best but they’re certainly not street thugs level
